00038     Alignment* MetaCircularAlignment::GotohAlignment(const bpp::Sequence* inA,
00039         const bpp::Sequence* inB, const ScoringModel* scoreM)
00040       {
00041         
00042         MetaRotatedSequence* A = new MetaRotatedSequence(inA);
00043 
00044         ScoreMatrix D = matrix->InitScoreMatrixWith(A, inB, 0);
00045         ScoreMatrix P = matrix->InitScoreMatrixWith(A, inB, 0);
00046         ScoreMatrix Q = matrix->InitScoreMatrixWith(A, inB, 0);
00047 
00048         //Forward Iteration
00049         ForwardRecursionGotoh(A, inB, scoreM, &D, &P, &Q);
00050 
00051         return BacktrackingGotoh(A, inB, scoreM, &D, &P, &Q);
00052 
00053       }
00054   }
